post.author: K. Kwon
post.content:
From: "Techko, Allan" <Allan.Techko@compuware.com> | This is spam | Add to Address Book

Subject: Hi Fred....
Date: Fri, 13 Jun 2003 11:12:04 -0400

good speaking with you, we are currently looking for Java, Sybase,
Perl,
Unix developers in Montreal. If you have any friends there please have
them
give me a call.

Thank you.

Allan Techko
Compuware Corporation
1-800-348-8299 x1244

post.title: Java, Sybase, Perl,Unix developers in Montreal
